title: Week 27 Liquidity Mining Proposal
body:
This marks the 27th week of liquidity mining on Balancer v2. The Ballers propose the following changes which will go into effect 00:00 UTC Monday, November 22nd, 2021. 

## Ethereum Pools
* Allocate 500 flexible BAL per week to NOTE/WETH - 50/50. This pool will now receive 500 BAL per week and 30,000 NOTE per week. 
* Allocate 300 flexible BAL per week to NEXO/WETH - 80/20. This pool will now receive 300 BAL per week and 2,000 NEXO per week. 

## Polygon Pools
* No proposed changes this week.

## Arbitrum Pools
* Remove 300 flexible BAL per week from TCR/WETH - 80/20. This pool will now receive 700 BAL per week. 
* Remove 500 flexible BAL per week from BAL/WETH - 60/40. This pool will now receive 3,500 BAL per week.

Link to pull request: https://github.com/balancer-labs/frontend-v2/pull/1108
author: 0x176001586fF17ad625Dc387557631710cf485f72
